author: timbeiko
content:
Very quick recap of the <#718596092828057631> breakout leading into tomorrow's call:
- There are many open questions around the long-term AA roadmap, how L1 vs. L2 support for larger changes would look like, and what should be enshrined vs. not.  
- There are a handful of smaller proposals that we _could_ do in Pectra, but we want to make sure we don't do something that prevents us from adopting AAs more broadly in the future. 
- We didn't cover 4337 much given the core team couldn't make it to the breakout, but hopefully they can come on tomorrow to give an overview of their roadmap. 

Not sure we'll be able to get consensus on if and what to ship in Prague, but hopefully we can cover the 4337 roadmap, L1 vs. L2 concerns (mostly client support for L2-specific features), and the differences between the various short term proposals. 

Here's the breakout recording for the full context: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FfEZdTFAz4E
